summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of CRUD to-do app design improvements. All requested features working perfectly including League Spartan font implementation, empty states, bubble designs, confetti animation, and task text wrapping.
passed_tests: Landing page displays with proper tagline and profile buttons at bottom
Profile screen shows three section cards with 2rem font titles (32px computed)
League Spartan font properly implemented across all text elements
Empty state displays correctly with emoji, text, and hint when no tasks in section
Footer has back arrow + clear (Tx) icons in same bubble design with proper styling
Task bubbles handle large/long text with proper wrapping without layout issues
Edit drawer displays back + delete icons in bubble design
All CRUD operations work: add, edit, delete, toggle completion
Confetti animation triggers when all tasks completed with colorful particles
Work profile maintains completely separate task storage (0 tasks vs Personal profile tasks)
Mobile-first responsive design with 390x844 viewport works perfectly
Task count badges update correctly and display proper counts
Section navigation works smoothly between today/tomorrow/someday
Add task drawer opens with proper placeholder text for each section
Task completion toggles work with proper visual feedback
Back navigation works correctly at all levels
